```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
enrollment <- read_excel("raw_data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_2-10-2021.xlsx", skip = 3)
enrollment %>%
  select("Course Title", "Total") %>%
  arrange(desc(Total)) %>%
  drop_na()
```
